description:
Vakoms is a custom software development company, delivering end-to-end IT solutions and services. Operating in the IT market since 2010 with R&D center in Ukraine, Vakoms has a portfolio of 300+ of successfully completed projects and over 120 in-house specialists.
We offer a full range of solutions and services, starting from IT consulting and finishing with product development from the ground up.
